description: This GUI tool makes it very simple to report bugs for Debian packages. The bug tracking system(BTS) is a complex piece of software with many different options. This tool makes is easy to report bugs without necessarily needing to become an expert at BTS.
summary: Excellent tool, makes reporting bugs very easy

description:
Brilliant app that makes bug reporting accessible to new comers. 

5 stars for the idea
2 stars for the current performance
